mapper.insert: insert into member(name, login_id, pwd, gender, email, tel1, tel2, tel3, role) values(#{name}, #{loginId}, #{pwd}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3}, #{role})
mapper.select: select login_id as loginId from member where login_id = #{loginId} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.delete: delete from member where login_id = #{loginId} and pwd = #{pwd}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where login_id=#{loginId}
mapper.update: update member set name = #{name}, pwd = #{pwd}, email = #{email}, gender = #{gender}, tel1 = #{tel1}, tel2 = #{tel2}, tel3 = #{tel3} where login_id = #{loginId}
